title: The owner shall submit the undertaking to the authority that, such architectural projection shall not be converted to any habitable or other purpose
clause_text: The owner shall submit the undertaking to the authority that, such architectural projection shall not be converted to any habitable or other purpose. Following amenities shall be provided in any housing scheme and shall be counted in FSI.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The owner shall submit the undertaking to the authority that, such architectural projection shall not be converted to any habitable or other purpose.
